targets.rawSql: SELECT MAX(slot) as value FROM slots WHERE status = 'rooted'

WITH ordered_slots AS (
  SELECT slot,
    CASE WHEN (
      bank_hash = '' 
      OR cumulative_lthash = '\x00'
      OR length(cumulative_lthash) = 0
    ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as is_missing,
    LAG(CASE WHEN (
      bank_hash = '' 
      OR cumulative_lthash = '\x00'
      OR length(cumulative_lthash) = 0
    ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY slot) as prev_is_missing
  FROM slots
  WHERE status = 'rooted'
)
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_gaps
FROM ordered_slots
WHERE is_missing = 1 AND prev_is_missing = 0

WITH missing_slots AS (
  SELECT slot
  FROM slots
  WHERE status = 'rooted'
    AND (
      bank_hash = '' 
      OR cumulative_lthash = '\x00'
      OR length(cumulative_lthash) = 0
    )
  ORDER BY slot
),
slot_ranges AS (
  SELECT 
    slot,
    slot - ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY slot) as grp
  FROM missing_slots
),
gaps AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN(slot) as gap_start,
    MAX(slot) as gap_end,
    MAX(slot) - MIN(slot) + 1 as gap_size,
    'Missing bank hash or LtHash data' as reason
  FROM slot_ranges
  GROUP BY grp
  ORDER BY MIN(slot) DESC
  LIMIT 25
)
SELECT * FROM gaps

SELECT 
  account_pubkey,
  added_at,
  last_seen_slot,
  last_seen_at,
  total_changes_tracked,
  total_data_bytes,
  active
FROM monitored_accounts
WHERE active = true
ORDER BY last_seen_at DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT 
  created_at AS time,
  account_pubkey,
  SUM(change_count) OVER (PARTITION BY account_pubkey ORDER BY created_at) as cumulative_changes
FROM account_change_stats
WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
ORDER BY created_at

WITH account_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    account_pubkey,
    COUNT(DISTINCT slot) as slots_with_changes,
    SUM(change_count) as total_changes,
    SUM(total_data_size) as total_data_bytes,
    AVG(total_data_size) as avg_data_size_per_change,
    MAX(slot) as last_change_slot,
    MAX(created_at) as last_change_time
  FROM account_change_stats
  WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
  GROUP BY account_pubkey
)
SELECT 
  s.account_pubkey,
  s.slots_with_changes,
  s.total_changes,
  s.total_data_bytes,
  ROUND(s.avg_data_size_per_change) as avg_data_size_per_change,
  s.last_change_slot,
  s.last_change_time,
  CASE WHEN m.active THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END as status
FROM account_stats s
LEFT JOIN monitored_accounts m ON s.account_pubkey = m.account_pubkey
ORDER BY s.total_changes DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT 
  slot,
  status,
  bank_hash,
  parent_bank_hash,
  signature_count,
  last_blockhash,
  encode(delta_lthash, 'hex') as delta_lthash_hex,
  encode(cumulative_lthash, 'hex') as cumulative_lthash_hex,
  accounts_delta_hash,
  blockhash,
  executed_transaction_count,
  entry_count,
  rooted_at
FROM slots 
WHERE status = 'rooted'
ORDER BY slot DESC 
LIMIT 128

panels.title: Recent Rooted Slots with Full LtHashes (Last 128)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  slot,
  status,
  bank_hash,
  signature_count,
  executed_transaction_count,
  vote_count,
  rooted_at
FROM slots 
WHERE status = 'rooted'
ORDER BY slot DESC 
LIMIT 100
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vote_type) as vote_types FROM vote_transactions WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_votes FROM vote_transactions WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'

WITH vote_rate AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) / 300.0 as votes_per_second
  FROM vote_transactions 
  WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
)
SELECT ROUND(votes_per_second::numeric, 2) as votes_per_second FROM vote_rate
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT voter_pubkey) as unique_voters FROM vote_transactions WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'

SELECT 
  vote_type,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM vote_transactions
WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
  AND vote_type IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY vote_type
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT 
  time_bucket('1 minute', created_at) AS time,
  vote_type,
  COUNT(*) as vote_count
FROM vote_transactions
WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 minutes'
  AND vote_type IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time, vote_type
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  time_bucket('1 minute', created_at) AS time,
  AVG(lockouts_count)::numeric as avg_lockouts
FROM vote_transactions
WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 minutes'
  AND lockouts_count IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
SELECT * FROM tower_sync_analysis LIMIT 50

SELECT 
  created_at AS time,
  root_depth
FROM tower_sync_analysis
WHERE root_depth IS NOT NULL
  AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
ORDER BY created_at
SELECT * FROM vote_consistency_check WHERE vote_pattern != 'normal' LIMIT 100

SELECT 
  slot,
  voter_pubkey,
  vote_signature,
  vote_type,
  vote_slot,
  lockouts_count,
  octet_length(vote_transaction) as transaction_size,
  created_at
FROM vote_transactions
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT voting_stake_percentage
FROM vote_participation_stats
WHERE "window" = '5 minutes'
ORDER BY last_updated DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  last_updated AS time,
  voting_stake_percentage AS value,
  "window" AS metric
FROM vote_participation_stats
WHERE last_updated > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
ORDER BY last_updated, "window"

SELECT 
  slot,
  voter_pubkey,
  vote_signature,
  created_at,
  validator_stake,
  stake_percentage,
  validator_status
FROM recent_votes_simple
LIMIT 100
SELECT pg_database_size('twine_solana_db') as size

SELECT 
    schemaname || '.' || tablename AS table,
    pg_total_relation_size(schemaname||'.'||tablename) AS size,
    pg_relation_size(schemaname||'.'||tablename) AS table_size,
    pg_indexes_size(schemaname||'.'||tablename) AS indexes_size
FROM pg_tables
WHERE schemaname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'information_schema')
ORDER BY pg_total_relation_size(schemaname||'.'||tablename) DESC
LIMIT 10
SELECT sum(size) as wal_size FROM pg_ls_waldir()

SELECT 
    hypertable_name,
    COUNT(*) as num_chunks,
    SUM(total_bytes) as total_size,
    SUM(total_bytes - index_bytes) as data_size,
    SUM(index_bytes) as index_size
FROM timescaledb_information.chunks
GROUP BY hypertable_name
ORDER BY SUM(total_bytes) DESC

SELECT 
    hypertable_name,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE is_compressed) as compressed_chunks,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE NOT is_compressed) as uncompressed_chunks,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_compressed THEN total_bytes ELSE 0 END) as compressed_size,
    SUM(CASE WHEN NOT is_compressed THEN total_bytes ELSE 0 END) as uncompressed_size
FROM timescaledb_information.chunks
GROUP BY hypertable_name

SELECT 
    schemaname || '.' || tablename AS table,
    n_dead_tup AS dead_tuples,
    n_live_tup AS live_tuples,
    ROUND(100.0 * n_dead_tup / NULLIF(n_live_tup + n_dead_tup, 0), 2) AS dead_percent
FROM pg_stat_user_tables
WHERE n_dead_tup > 1000
ORDER BY n_dead_tup DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  NOW() as time,
  pg_database_size('twine_solana_db') as "Database Size"
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' as time,
  pg_database_size('twine_solana_db') as "Database Size"
